login-register:script: Join now to make new friends, create groups, add photos and more.
login-register:policyMessage: Please agree to our Terms and Conditions.
login-register:policyLink: Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
login-register:error_message: Invalid account, please check your email or phone number and password

login-register:errors_message_register.2: Username must be shorter than or equal to 20 characters
login-register:errors_message_register.3: Name must be shorter than or equal to 20 characters
login-register:errors_message_register.5: Please enter a valid email address
login-register:errors_message_register.7: Password must be at least 8 characters, including at least 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase, a number and 1 special characters
